result.execSummary:
The defendant Lazeric R. Maxey was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Lazeric R. Maxey is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Lazeric R. Maxey was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property fr. Person/Corpse [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Kenosha County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to 14CM824.  No credit for time served if probation is revoked.

miscConds.notes: If probation or extended supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.  This applies to all counts and financial obligations.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.
*  Pay supervision fees.
Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not be in taverns or on any premises licensed for the sale of intoxicating beverages, except restaurants or grocery stores.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by agent.  Counseling shall specifically include:  AODA Assessment and follow through with recommended treatment.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*  Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.
May not have contact with Victim or Co-Defts, unless otherwise permitted by the court/agent.

supervisions.notes: CV Judgment is entered for unpaid financial obligations.
PROBATION HAS BEEN REVOKED.  TO COMMENCE FORTHWITH.

Pursuant to Wisconsin's Supreme Court Order issued March 22, 2020 this hearing is being held via video conferencing.  The proceeding was broadcast via YouTube.  Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared w/ Attorney William Michel II.  Argument given by both attorneys.  The DE gave his statement to the court.  The court sentences the DE to 1 year KCJ - Credit for 149 days.
Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample (unless previously provided) & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.  Any outstanding costs & fees are to be converted to a civil judgment.
Clerk D. Smith.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State. Def. Lazeric Maxey appeared with Atty. Andrea Rufo; Def. Eltag Abusam appeared with Atty. Jerold Breitenbach; Def. Dashai Brown-Young appeared with Atty. Brett Ekes; Def. Juwon Brown appeared with Atty. David Celebre. Clerk LE. Preliminary hearings held jointly in 14CF1260/14CF1261/14CF1262/14CF1263. KPD Det. Daniel DeJong sworn in and testified on behalf of the State. Cross-examination by Atty. Breitenbach. Cross-examination by Atty. Celebre. Cross-examination by Atty. Rufo. Cross-examination by Atty. Ekes. Probable cause found. Request for substitution of Judge Schroeder filed by Attys. Rufo, Breitenbach, Ekes, and Celebre. Tab pulled for Judge Kerkman. Bound over to Br. 8. Information filed, plea of not guilty. Judicial pretrial on 1-13-15 @ 8:30am with co-defs. Bond continued.
Scheduling Order
of Judge Schroeder filed by Attys. Rufo, Breitenbach, Ekes, and Celebre, attorneys for all four co-defendants. Tab pulled for Judge Kerkman.
filed by Atty. Andrea Rufo  kmk
